cards.title: Slaughterhouse 9
setup: Search the Villain deck for all Nine cards, shuffle them, and put them under this card. Move the top H cards from under this card into the villain play area.
gameplay: Whenever a Nine card would be destroyed, flip it instead. Whenever no villain targets are in play, the heroes win the game
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn move the top card under this card into the villain play area.

cards.title: Jack Slash
gameplay: Once per turn, when an Attack card enters the trash, this card deals X melee damage to each hero, where X = 2 * the number of Powers controlled by that player
Once per turn, when a Special card enters the trash, play the top card of the villain deck
flippedGameplay: Whenever a hero uses a power this card deals that hero 1 melee damage

cards.title: Bonesaw
gameplay: Once per turn, when a Defence card enters the trash each villain target regains 2 HP
Once per turn, when a Special card enters the trash this card deals 2 toxic damage to all non-villain targets
flippedGameplay: At the end of the villain turn the villain target with the lowest HP regains 1 HP

cards.title: Crawler
gameplay: Whenever Crawler is dealt damage he becomes immune to that damage type until the next time he takes damage.
Once per turn, when an Attack card enters the trash this card deals 2 toxic damage and 2 melee damage to the non-villain target with the highest HP.
Once per turn, when a Special card enters the trash this card regains 30 HP
flippedGameplay: At the end of the villain turn this card deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP

cards.title: Burnscar
gameplay: Once per turn, when a Special card enters the trash destroy all environment cards, then Burnscar deals X fire damage to all non-villain targets, where X = 1 + the number of environment cards destroyed in this way
Once per turn, when an Attack card enters the trash this card deals 3 fire damage to the hero target with the lowest HP, then destroy a noncharacter hero card
flippedGameplay: At the end of the villain turn this card deals 1 fire damage to all non-villain targets

cards.title: Mannequin
gameplay: Reduce damage dealt to Mannequin by 1
Once per turn, when a Defence card enters the trash destroy 1 hero Ongoing or Equipment card
flippedGameplay: Reduce damage dealt to the villain target with the lowest HP by 1

cards.title: Shatterbird
gameplay: Once per turn, when an Attack card enters the trash Shatterbird deals 2 projectile damage to the H - 1 hero targets with the highest HP
flippedGameplay: At the end of the villain turn this card deals 1 projectile damage to all non-villain targets

cards.title: The Siberian
gameplay: The Nine target played just before and just after The Siberian are immune to damage
flippedGameplay: The villain target with the lowest HP is immune to melee damage

cards.title: Cherish
gameplay: Once per turn, when a Defence card enters the trash the hero with the most cards in hand discards 2 cards
Whenever Cherish is dealt damage, Cherish deals 2 psychic damage to the target that dealt her damage
flippedGameplay: Whenever a target is destroyed during a hero's turn, that hero deals themselves 1 psychic damage

cards.title: Murder Rat
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn Murder Rat deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP

cards.title: Spiderbots
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn this card deals X melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP, where X = 1 + the number of Spiderbots in play

cards.title: They're All Better Now
cards.body: Flip the most recently defeated Nine card and set their HP to 10. If no cards are flipped in this way play the top card of the villain deck

cards.title: Some Light Entertainment
cards.body: Each villain target in play deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the highest HP

cards.title: The Scream
body: Each hero may destroy any number of Equipment cards.
The Nine card with the highest HP deals each hero target X projectile damage, where X = 2 * the number of Equipment cards in play

cards.title: Legend
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by villain cards by 1

cards.title: Less Than Human
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1

cards.title: Some More Friends
cards.body: Move the top card under the Slaughterhouse 9 card into the villain play area. Play the top card of the villain deck

cards.title: Shall We Play a Game?
cards.body: If Jack Slash is not in play, find Jack Slash under the Slaughterhouse 9 card and put him into the villain play area. Jack Slash deals 2 psychic damage to all hero targets

cards.title: Change the Rules
body: The heroes can't win the game

Shuffle all Nine targets in play back under the Slaughterhouse 9 card. Move X cards from under the Slaughterhouse 9 card into the villain play area, where X = 1 + the number of Nine cards that were in play

cards.title: We Don't Take Prisoners
cards.body: Whenever a target is destroyed by a villain card each hero deals themselves 2 psychic damage.
